The ark isn't a base. Well, it is in the sense that the Autobots used 
it, but in this rpg, nobody can use it. (Somebody is taking care of 
it, but he hasn't posted since like february, so I don't think that he's 
around still. NOTE: his characters didn't use it as a base.) A battle 
cruiser is not necessarily depicted by whether it can move or not. 
lol. 

gtg, won't be able to post for 24h. =(

On 31 Jul 2001, at 23:04, dewboy30816@... wrote:

>  Speaking of which how'd the Ark get there since bases aren't suppose
> to be able to move. Further more did I say anything about disrupting
> their orbit. They can stay right there for as long time for all I
> care. And it wouldn't be a battlecruiser becuse it CAN'T MOVE. Not to
> mention for powers sake only a small part of the actual moon will
> probably be used or they would't have the power to defend themselves.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> > Its big, its bigger then a battle cruiser, it wouldnt count as a BC 
> since its 
> > a moon and I believe that the moon s already taken as a base or a 
> hide out. 
> > The ark is orbiting it is I recall correctly from the evens page.
